body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia             Photos & Multimedia         Some of nature's most awe-inspiring landscapes lie hidden underground, such as the Chandelier Ballroom in Lechuguilla Cave. NPS Photo/Gavin Newman  Browse through our photo galleries to see photographs of the Big Room, Natural Entrance, and our ranger-guided tours! Please contact us if you require more information about these images.
title: Carlsbad Caverns National Park: Photos & Multimedia
